Label: has consent status
Definition: Specifies the state or status of consent
Contributors: Georg P. Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Paul Ryan, Julian Flake

Label: has consent control
Definition: Specific a control associated with consent

Label: has expiry
Definition: Generic property specifying when or under which condition(s) the consent will expire
Contributors: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar, Bud Bruegger

Label: has expiry time
Definition: Specifies the expiry time or duration for consent
Contributors: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar, Bud Bruegger

Label: has expiry condition
Definition: Specifies the condition or event that determines the expiry of consent
Contributors: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar, Bud Bruegger

Label: has provision method
Definition: Specifies the method by which consent was provisioned or provided
Contributors: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar, Bud Bruegger

Label: has provision time
Definition: Specifies the instant in time when consent was given
Contributors: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar, Bud Bruegger

Label: has withdrawal method
Definition: Specifies the method by which consent can be/has been withdrawn
Contributors: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar, Bud Bruegger

Label: has withdrawal time
Definition: Specifies the instant in time when consent was withdrawn
Contributors: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar, Bud Bruegger

Label: has withdrawal by
Definition: Specifies the entity that withdrew consent
Contributors: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar, Bud Bruegger

Label: has provision by
Definition: Specifies the entity that provisioned or provided consent
Contributors: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar, Bud Bruegger

Label: has provision by justification
Definition: Specifies the justification for entity providing consent
Contributors: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar, Bud Bruegger

Label: has withdrawal by justification
Definition: Specifies the justification for entity withdrawing consent
Contributors: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar, Bud Bruegger

Label: has consent notice
Definition: Specifies the notice provided in context of consent
Contributors: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar, Bud Bruegger

Label: is explicit
Contributors: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Mark Lizar, Bud Bruegger
